results.title: [Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome--case report, diagnostics and therapeutic options].
results.text_hl: We report on a female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who was born at 37 weeks of gestation and was both small and light for gestational age who displayed typical signs of @<m>DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@SLOS@@@. After the diagnosis had been confirmed, a therapeutic approach with oral substitution of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and the administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was initiated.

citations.NLM: Oberthür A, Heller R, Vogel M, Körber F, Rahimi G, Hoopmann M, Emmel M, Roth B, Vierzig A. [Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome--case report, diagnostics and therapeutic options]. Z Geburtshilfe Neonatol. 2009 Oct;213(5):210-4. PMID: 19856245
citations.BibTeX: @article{19856245, title={[Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome--case report, diagnostics and therapeutic options].}, author={Oberthür A and Heller R and Vogel M and Körber F and Rahimi G and Hoopmann M and Emmel M and Roth B and Vierzig A}, journal={Z Geburtshilfe Neonatol}, volume={213}, number={5}, pages={210-4}}

results.title: Influence of simvastatin, pravastatin, and BM 15.766 on neutral sterols in liver and testis of guinea pigs.
results.text_hl: We conclude that treatment of @SPECIES_10141 @@@guinea pigs@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, or @CHEMICAL_BM_15766 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C047457 @@@BM 15.766@@@, which simulates the biochemical defect of the @<m>DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@Smith-Lemli-Opitz (SLO) syndrome@@@, does not affect T-MAS concentrations in testis.

citations.NLM: Lindenthal B, Bertsch T, Fassbender K, Stroick M, Kühl S, Lütjohann D, von Bergmann K. Influence of simvastatin, pravastatin, and BM 15.766 on neutral sterols in liver and testis of guinea pigs. Metabolism. 2002 Apr;51(4):492-9. PMID: 11912560
